pageTitle: Haute Hippie Pleated Shirtdress with Lace | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 35in / 89cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Made in the USA. Dry clean. 100% silk. Fabric: Silk georgette. Contrast lace stripes lend vintage appeal to this silk Haute Hippie shirtdress, while slim pleats add delicate texture. A fold-over collar leads into the button placket, and an optional self-sash ties at the waist. Long sleeves and button cuffs. Unlined. Semi-sheer. Description Our top picks in Jewelry > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Haute Hippie takes you from inner to outer, day to night, and metropolis to sanctuary by emphasizing the art of layering and by embracing eclectic style and sophistication. As a single destination for fashion basics, layering items, and loungewear with a designer aesthetic and contemporary price, Haute Hippie provides inspired everyday looks and attainable luxury. Look sexy, be confident, and feel relaxed with an air of independence, freedom, and style.
